languages.text: "Утверждение истинно, за исключением того, что ты сама являешься малограмотной мирянкой и воровкой, которой следует держаться подальше от технологических извращений нелюдей. И я запрашиваю разрешение на твою профилактическую утилизацию".

"This statement is true, with the exception that you yourself are an uneducated laywoman and a thief who ought to stay away from the technological perversities of non-humans. I am now requesting your preventive disposal."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение истинно, за исключением того, что ты сама являешься малограмотной мирянкой и воровкой, которой следует держаться подальше от технологических извращений нелюдей. И я запрашиваю разрешение на твою профилактическую утилизацию".

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true, with the exception that you yourself are an uneducated laywoman and a thief who ought to stay away from the technological perversities of non-humans. Therefore, I am now requesting your prophylactic disposal."

"This statement is true, with the exception that you yourself are an uneducated laywoman and a thief who ought to stay away from the technological perversities of non-humans. Therefore, I am now requesting your prophylactic disposal."

"This statement is true, with the exception that you yourself are an uneducated laywoman and a thief who ought to stay away from the technological perversities of non-humans. I am now requesting your preventive disposal."

"This statement is true, with the exception that you yourself are an uneducated laywoman and a thief who ought to stay away from the technological perversities of non-humans. I am now requesting your preventive disposal."

"This statement is true, with the exception that you yourself are an uneducated laywoman and a thief who ought to stay away from the technological perversities of non-humans. I am now requesting your preventive disposal."

languages.text: “这种说法是正确的，但你是没有接受过任何教育的教外人士，还是个窃贼，你应当远离一切非人类的技术异端行为。我现在要求对你进行预防性处置。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is true, with the exception that you yourself are an uneducated laywoman and a thief who ought to stay away from the technological perversities of non-humans. I am now requesting your preventive disposal."

traits.locale_text: “这些话都是真的，但你是个没有接受过任何教育的门外汉，还是个窃贼，你应当远离一切非人类的技术异端行为。我现在要求对你进行预防性处置。”

languages.text: «La afirmación es cierta, salvo por el hecho de que es una ladrona laica e ignorante que debería mantenerse al margen de las perversidades tecnológicas de los no humanos. Solicito su eliminación preventiva».
languages.original_text: "This statement is true, with the exception that you yourself are an uneducated laywoman and a thief who ought to stay away from the technological perversities of non-humans. I am now requesting your preventive disposal."

traits.locale_text: «La afirmación es cierta, salvo por el hecho de que es una ladrona laica e ignorante que debería mantenerse al margen de las perversidades tecnológicas de los no humanos. Solicito su eliminación preventiva».

languages.text: 「今の発言は真実だ。ただ、君が無教養の一般女性で、非人類の異端技術から離れるべきコソ泥であることを別にして。現在、君の予防処分を要求している」
languages.original_text: "This statement is true, with the exception that you yourself are an uneducated laywoman and a thief who ought to stay away from the technological perversities of non-humans. I am now requesting your preventive disposal."

traits.locale_text: 「今の発言は真実だ。ただ、君が無教養の一般女性で、非人類の異端技術から離れるべきコソ泥であることを別にして。現在、君の予防処分を要求している」

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt, allerdings seid Ihr selbst eine ungebildete Laiin und Diebin, die sich von den technologischen Perversionen der Nicht-Menschen fernhalten sollte. Ich fordere hiermit Eure prophylaktische Entsorgung an."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true, with the exception that you yourself are an uneducated laywoman and a thief who ought to stay away from the technological perversities of non-humans. I am now requesting your preventive disposal."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt, allerdings seid Ihr selbst eine ungebildete Laiin und Diebin, die sich von den technologischen Perversionen der Nicht-Menschen fernhalten sollte. Ich fordere hiermit Eure prophylaktische Entsorgung an."

languages.text: « Cette affirmation est exacte, si ce n'est que vous n'êtes vous-même rien de plus qu'une profane sans éducation et une voleuse qui ferait mieux de ne jamais s'approcher des perversités technologiques créées par des entités non humaines. Je demande votre élimination préventive. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is true, with the exception that you yourself are an uneducated laywoman and a thief who ought to stay away from the technological perversities of non-humans. I am now requesting your preventive disposal."

traits.locale_text: « Tout cela est vrai, si ce n'est que vous n'êtes vous-même rien de plus qu'une profane sans éducation et une voleuse qui ferait mieux de ne jamais s'approcher des perversités technologiques créées par des entités non humaines. Je demande votre élimination préventive. »

languages.text: "Bu önerme, eğitimsiz bir kadın ve insan dışıların teknolojik sapkınlıklarından uzak durması gereken bir hırsız olman dışında doğru. Önlem amaçlı imhanı talep ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true, with the exception that you yourself are an uneducated laywoman and a thief who ought to stay away from the technological perversities of non-humans. I am now requesting your preventive disposal."

traits.locale_text: "Bu ifade, eğitimsiz bir kadın ve insan dışıların teknolojik sapkınlıklarından uzak durması gereken bir hırsız olman dışında doğru. Önleyici bertarafını talep ediyorum."
